sentences.sContent: Law An annulment acquittal ; dismissal, of a court order.
sentences.sContent_eng: Law An annulment acquittal ; dismissal, of a court order.
sentences.sCn: 取消， 宣告无罪； 法院命令的撤销。

sentences.sContent: The limits of authority for approving the annulment of a reserve rank shall be the same as those for approving the conferment of the rank.
sentences.sContent_eng: The limits of authority for approving the annulment of a reserve rank shall be the same as those for approving the conferment of the rank.
sentences.sCn: 批准取消预备役军官军衔的权限，与批准授予该级预备役军官军衔的权限相同。

remMethod.val: an(表加强) + nul(毫无， 没有) + ment(名词后缀) → 废除， 取消
